description.value: You gain a +2 enhancement bonus on Bluff and Disguise skill checks. This bonus increases by 1 for every 5 wizard levels you have, up to a maximum of +6 at 20th level. At 20th level, you gain the benefits of @Compendium[pf1.spells.8nrt26t37v7koqr8]{Misdirection} (Will DC = 20 + your Intelligence modifier) or @Compendium[pf1.spells.awia42zci8nufpfl]{Nondetection} permanently. At will as a standard action, you can change which of the two spells is active, and each time you activate @Compendium[pf1.spells.8nrt26t37v7koqr8]{Misdirection}, you can choose a new creature or object as the secondary object.
